name: Saja Boys
description: Saja Boys is a unique concept group featuring mysterious and charismatic members with a lion-inspired theme.

funFacts: The alpha lion of Saja Boys
His powerful vocals lead the pack
members.bio: Jinu is Saja Boys' lion king leader whose powerful vocals and commanding presence lead the pack. His protective nature and golden charisma make him the alpha of the group.

funFacts: His dancing is graceful like a hunting lion
Known for his striking golden features
members.bio: Abby is Saja Boys' visual whose graceful dancing mirrors a lion's hunt. His golden features and striking presence make him unforgettable on stage.

funFacts: Raps about the mysteries of life
Known for his dark, enigmatic aura
His stage presence is hauntingly powerful
members.bio: Mystery is Saja Boys' enigmatic rapper whose true identity remains unknown. His dark, powerful rap and mysterious aura create an unforgettable presence.
Romance is Saja Boys' heart-stealer born on Valentine's Day. His romantic vocals and charming personality make every fan feel special and loved.

funFacts: The lion cub of Saja Boys
The mood maker of the group
members.bio: Baby is Saja Boys' adorable lion cub and maknae. Though cute and playful, he shows fierce potential. His growth into a full lion is exciting to watch.

seo.title: Saja Boys Name Generator | Create Your Korean Name with Lions
seo.description: Create your Saja Boys name with Jinu, Abby, Mystery, Romance & Baby! Instant chemistry scores & Korean names. Perfect for Lions fanfiction.
